nodes.text: The Martyr was a shuttle used by General Grievous.

The Martyr was Grievous' personal shuttle during the Huk War. He also utilized it when he broke his contract with the InterGalactic Banking Clan and attempted to return to Kalee to restart the war. A Separatist ion bomb hidden aboard the vessel exploded, killing most if not all of Grievous's Kaleesh elite, the Izvoshra, and dealing crippling injuries to Grievous's body which would ultimately require that he be rebuilt as a cyborg. The wreckage of the Martyr plunged into the depths of the Jenuwaa Sea.
